00043 RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxAccountList::
00044 FoxAccountList(FXComposite *parent,FXuint opts)
00045   :FXPacker(parent, opts)
00046 {
00047   accountList=new xmlAccountList();
00048 
00049   FXVerticalFrame *root = new FXVerticalFrame(this,
00050              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00051 
00052   FXString lab="This screen provides the account management. From the list "
00053     "of account below, you can chose one and edit it.";
00054   FXLabel* labAdminName=new FXLabel(root, lab);
00055 
00056  // frame containing admin info and button
00057   FXHorizontalFrame *hframe = new FXHorizontalFrame(root,
00058              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00059 
00060 
00061   FXVerticalFrame *frame = new FXVerticalFrame(hframe,
00062              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00063 
00064 
00065   table=new FXTable(frame, NULL, 0, LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00066   table->insertColumns(0, 5);
00067   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(0, "Name");
00068   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(1, "Mail");
00069   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(2, "Blacklist");
00070   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(3, "Creation");
00071   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(4, "Confirmation");
00072   table->getRowHeader()->setWidth(40);
00073 
00074   // Accountlist count label
00075   labPlCount=new FXLabel(frame, "Total accounts : <not set>");
00076 
00077   // Buttons in the right
00078   FXVerticalFrame *btnFrame = new FXVerticalFrame(hframe);
00079   FXuint btnOpts= LAYOUT_FILL_X|BUTTON_NORMAL;
00080   FXButton* btn1=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Add", NULL, NULL, 0, btnOpts);
00081   FXButton* btn2=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Delete", NULL, NULL, 0, btnOpts);
00082   FXButton* btn3=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Toggle blacklist", NULL, NULL, 0, 
00083                                btnOpts);
00084   FXButton* btn4=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Change password", NULL, NULL, 0, 
00085                                btnOpts);
00086   FXButton* btn5=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Edit", NULL, NULL, 0, btnOpts);
00087 
00088   // Initialize the panel
00089   this->feedTable();
00090 
00091 }

00097   delete accountList;

00121 long RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxAccountList::
00122 onNotYetImplemented(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){

00131 void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxAccountList::feedTable(){
00132   LOGI("Starting feedTable");
00133   tAccountList* pl=accountList->getAccountList();
00134   if (pl){
00135     setAccountNumber(pl->size());
00136 
00137     // Feeding ^^
00138     tAccountList::const_iterator iter;
00139     for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00140       this->addAccount((*iter));
00141     }
00142 
00143     pl=NULL;
00144     LOGI("feedTable complete");
00145   }
00146   else{
00147     LOGE("Cannot get a valid account list");
00148   }
00149 }
00150 
00158 void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxAccountList::setAccountNumber(unsigned int i){
00159   std::ostringstream temp ;
00160   temp << "Total accounts : ";
00161   temp << i;
00162 
00163   labPlCount->setText(temp.str().c_str());
00164 }
00165 
00171 void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxAccountList::
00172 addAccount(RainbruRPG::Gui::tAccountListItem* p){
00173   FXString s;
00174 
00175   FXint num=table->getNumRows();
00176   // Adds a new row at the end of the table
00177   table->insertRows(num, 1);
00178 
00179   std::ostringstream temp ;
00180   temp << num+1;
00181 
00182   // Set the row header
00183   table->getRowHeader()->setItemText(num, temp.str().c_str());
00184   table->getRowHeader()->setItemJustify(num, FXHeaderItem::RIGHT);
00185 
00186   // Sets the name
00187   FXTableItem* item=new FXTableItem(p->name);
00188   table->setItem(num, 0, item);
00189 
00190   // Sets the mail
00191   FXTableItem* item2=new FXTableItem(p->mail);
00192   table->setItem(num, 1, item2);
00193 
00194   // Sets the blacklist status
00195   if (p->blacklist)
00196     s="Yes";
00197   else
00198     s="No";
00199 
00200   FXTableItem* item3=new FXTableItem(s);
00201   table->setItem(num, 2, item3);
00202 
00203   // Sets the creation date
00204   FXTableItem* item4=new FXTableItem(p->creation.c_str());
00205   table->setItem(num, 3, item4);
00206 
00207   // Sets the confirmation date
00208   FXTableItem* item5=new FXTableItem(p->confirm.c_str());
00209   table->setItem(num, 4, item5);
00210 
00211 }
